newsArray.title: Kickoff | Barker singles out Stellies subs after Pirates win
newsArray.description: Stellenbosch FC coach Steve Barker had some special praise for second-half substitutes who inspired the comeback win over Orlando Pirates.
newsArray.content: Stellies staged an incredible comeback, after rallying from 2-0 down with 21 minutes to go to beat Pirates at Orlando Stadium courtesy of goals from Iqraam Rayners, Devon Titus and Andre de Jong, within a period of eight minutes. Barker revealed the halftime talk he had with his players, although he admitted that at 2-0 down, he thought the game was beyond them. "At half-time we obviously had a serious chat, I just felt first-half we weren't at the races, we just gave them too much respect, we weren't brave enough to get the ball and play," Barker told SuperSport TV. "And I just said to them, listen here, 'We've got nothing to lose in the second-half, just show more braveness, more courage, get on the ball, play the way we can, we're champions of the cup recently for nothing, we're not on an unbeaten run of ten games for nothing. Go and show who you are and what you're made of'. "And when we went 2-0 down, you know I thought obviously the game may be beyond us but I thought a big change was our substitutes. I thought Antonio Van Wyk came on and changed the game, causing problems, we got a little braver with the ball. "Jayden Adams drafted into midfield, helped us with the build-up, (Nhlanhla) Mgaga added, Andre de Jong added to our play and it must be, I don't know, three goals in how minutes, it's probably one of the most incredible moments in that short period. "To come away from home after all the travelling we've been through, 2-0 down at Orlando Stadium, with a big crowd behind Orlando Pirates, to come and win 3-2 it's just amazing," he went on. "I cannot have enough words to say for this group of players, their commitment, their character, their never-say-die-attitude, the way they keep fighting for each other, the way they keep working hard on the field. "That's the reward you get when you put in the hard yards, so credit to them. It's been a fantastic 2023 for us, we finished the year on a high and we look forward to the Carling challenge next week. "It's an incredible eight minutes of football from Stellenbosch Football Club, it's just something really special to come here, get three points, and do the double over Pirates this season. It's massive to be in the top three, four on the log with a game in hand. We can really be proud of what we've done," he added.

newsArray.title: Mercato - PSG : Mbappé a fait une promesse au Real Madrid
newsArray.description: Le 1er janvier approche et à partir de cette date, Kylian Mbappé pourra s’engager avec le club de son choix, lui qui est sous contrat jusqu’en juin 2024 avec le PSG. Une situation dont a bien…
newsArray.content: Le 1er janvier approche et à partir de cette date, Kylian Mbappé pourra s’engager avec le club de son choix, lui qui est sous contrat jusqu’en juin 2024 avec le PSG. Une situation dont a bien l’intention de profiter le Real Madrid. Les Merengue devraient entrer en contact à partir de la semaine prochaine, comme cela serait convenu depuis l’été dernier. Comme indiqué par The Athletic , le Real Madrid va bientôt passer à l’action pour Kylian Mbappé . Ce dernier est toujours sous contrat jusqu’en juin 2024 avec le PSG et dans ces conditions, les Merengue vont de nouveau essayer de s’attacher ses services. Cependant, ils n’attendront pas sa réponse indéfiniment. Mercato - PSG : Une star vend la mèche pour son transfert ? https://t.co/l4AkC0AX1c pic.twitter.com/Rx7TiFu27T Le Real Madrid veut connaître la décision de Kylian Mbappé avant mi-janvier selon The Athletic . Marca de son côté indique que la Casa Blanca attendra la semaine prochaine avant d’entrer en contact avec l’international français. Le but étant de savoir s’il veut rester au PSG ou s’il est prêt à enfin rejoindre le Real Madrid . D’après le quotidien espagnol, Kylian Mbappé aurait assuré au Real Madrid il y a plusieurs mois qu’il comptait le rejoindre. Les deux parties auraient convenu à ce moment-là de se recontacter au début du mois de janvier, période où l’international français sera libre de signer dans un autre club que le PSG .

newsArray.title: BREAKING Ipswich Town vs QPR game suspended over medical emergency in the crowd
creator: staronline@reachplc.com (Kasra Moradi)
newsArray.description: QPR's visit to Ipswich Town in the Championship was temporarily halted after a fan
newsArray.content: Ipswich Town and QPR's Championship clash was postponed due to a medical emergency in the crowd. Friday night's fixture had to be halted due to a medical emergency in the Sir Alf Ramsey Stand. That resulted in a delay to the second half. Paramedics rushed to the scene and a blue blanket was placed to cover the area. Portman Road's PA system then announced that the start of the second half would be delayed. A stretcher was brought to the front of the stand to help treat the fan. There was widespread applause as the supporter was stretchered down the tunnel The official Ipswich Twitter account wrote: "The paramedics have assisted the supporter in the Sir Alf Ramsey Stand and our thoughts are with everyone involved."

Le sélectionneur des Lions a par ailleurs affirmé qu’il fallait toutefois montrer que le Sénégal pouvait gagner avec des cadres évoluant partout dans le monde y compris dans des championnats supposés « moins compétitifs ». newsArray.title: ESPN to Deploy Onboard Float Camera, Multiple Drones, and Unreal Engine-Powered Graphics for 2024 Rose Parade Coverage
creator: SVG Staff
newsArray.description: ABC, the longtime broadcast home of the Rose Parade, will collaborate with ESPN to televise the 135th edition of the New Year’s Day parade in Pasadena, CA to millions around the country. To celebrate the excitement surrounding the postseason and the Road to Houston, ESPN has entered a float in this year’s parade for the first time in nearly two decades. Planning began with ESPN’s Synergy team in early November, and the result has been an intensive cross-departmental effort to bring the floral-decorated, football-themed float to life. For the first time in history, an onboard camera will show a float traveling from the barns in Irwindale to the start of the parade route in Pasadena on the evening of Dec. 31. Drones will be used throughout the production of this year’s parade, giving viewers an aerial look at the pageantry and passion surrounding this annual celebration. In addition, ESPN’s highly stylized graphics package produced using Epic Games' Unreal Engine, which debuted in last year’s show, will return for the broadcast. Unreal Engine took a major leap forward during last year's Rose Parade production when ESPN became the first to deploy UE as an end-to-end live-broadcast-graphics tool. ESPN used the Project Avalanche” tool in Unreal Engine 5 to produce the entire graphics package from design to on-air playout. “A collaboration between Marketing, Media Planning, and Synergy, we entered CFP planning in search of a one-of-a-kind, high impact tactic that would have extensive reach and would delight fans in a way we never have before,” says Erin Thornton, Senior Director of Synergy Strategy and Solutions. “We gravitated toward partnering with the Tournament of Roses on a float that showcases two icons of the postseason – the Rose Bowl and the College Football Playoff National Championship trophy. We couldn't think of a more unique way to drive tune-in to the National Championship Game, celebrate the final four-team Playoff, and dazzle parade viewers with a beautiful float and some of their favorite ESPN personalities.” ESPN’s float celebrates the four CFP Semifinalists – Michigan, Washington, Texas and Alabama – whose stories meet at The Rose Bowl Game Presented by Prudential and The Allstate Sugar Bowl, as well as those who make the sport truly special, the fans. The float itself tops out at 16 feet tall – thanks to a towering CFP trophy – and is 28 feet long and 17 feet wide. Nearly 6,000 flowers were used to create ESPN’s float and the construction utilizes sod directly from the Rose Bowl Stadium, as well as a mix of materials ranging from green ground parsley flakes, white fine ground rice, stems of brown coffee, gold flax seed, whole split pea, and more. Riding this year’s ESPN float will be Laura Rutledge, Tim Tebow, Paul Finebaum, Jordan Rodgers and Roman Harper of SEC Network’s SEC Nation, Jess Sims from ESPN’s College GameDay Built by the Home Depot, Marty Smith and Ryan McGee of SEC Network’s Marty & McGee, Andrew Spencer from ABC’s The Bachelorette, plus celebrity superfans representing both participating teams in Pasadena – country music chart-topper Walker Hayes (Alabama) and Golden Globe & Emmy Award-winner Darren Criss (Michigan). In addition, executive director of the College Football Playoff Bill Hancock and his wife Nicki will join the ESPN personalities on the float. Both Sims and Marty & McGee will report from the float as it heads down the parade route toward Orange & Colorado. For the ABC broadcast, SportsCenter anchors Hannah Storm and Kevin Negandhi return to co-host the 135th Rose Parade on ABC. The annual “Where Flowers Meet Football” handoff during the parade broadcast will be performed by recent College Football Hall of Fame inductee Tebow, who will pass the football to ESPN teammates Rece Davis and Desmond Howard of College GameDay Built by The Home Depot, representing the progression in the day’s events from the Rose Parade to the Rose Bowl Game Presented by Prudential. ESPN’s production of the 135th Rose Parade on ABC kicks off a full day of football action across ESPN platforms, including the MegaCast presentations of the College Football Playoff Semifinals at the Rose Bowl Game Presented by Prudential (5 p.m.) and the Allstate Sugar Bowl (8:45 p.m.). College GameDay Built by The Home Depot will host its annual Rose Bowl Game edition on New Year’s Day, as part of ESPN’s overall studio coverage. Lead ESPN college football analyst Kirk Herbstreit will be inducted into the Rose Bowl Hall of Fame on New Year’s Day, while also calling his 16th Rose Bowl Game. The newly minted Hall of Famer will be joined on the game call by longtime play-by-play partner Chris Fowler, Emmy Award winner Holly Rowe and NFL Live and SEC Nation host Laura Rutledge, who kicks off her day on ESPN’s Rose Bowl Parade float.

newsArray.title: Kenny Pickett won't start but questionable to back up Mason Rudolph
newsArray.description: The Steelers announced Friday that Mason Rudolph will get a second consecutive start at quarterback.
newsArray.content: The Steelers announced Friday that Mason Rudolph will get a second consecutive start at quarterback. The team lists Kenny Pickett (ankle) as questionable, so he could return as the backup this week. Pickett said earlier this week that he is ready to return after surgery earlier this month, but it’s not his decision on when he returns. “It feels like with what I need to do,” Pickett said, via Ray Fittipaldo of the . “It’s really not how I feel. It’s what they see me doing and how they feel like I’m moving around and everything.” The Steelers made Pickett inactive last week. Although Rudolph took the first-team reps this week, Pickett got some work, too. The team ruled out defensive back Trenton Thompson (neck), free safety Minkah Fitzpatrick (knee) and outside linebacker Elandon Roberts (pectoral).

newsArray.title: Ολυμπιακός: Ο Ναβάρο και οι επόμενες κινήσεις
newsArray.description: Ο Φραν Ναβάρο είναι έτοιμος να φορέσει τη φανέλα του Ολυμπιακού, την ίδια στιγμή που στις τάξεις των «ερυθρολεύκων» τρέχουν και άλλες περιπτώσεις για να ενισχυθεί το ρόστερ.
newsArray.content: Λίγο πριν ανοίξει το μεταγραφικό παζάρι του Γενάρη, ο Ολυμπιακός είναι έτοιμος να ολοκληρώσει την πρώτη του χειμερινή μεταγραφή που ακούει στο όνομα του Φραν Ναβάρο. Ο 25χρονος φορ θα έρθει ως δανεικός από την Πόρτο και θα έχει οψιόν αγοράς ύψους 7,5 εκατ. ευρώ για το ερχόμενο καλοκαίρι όπως έγραψε ο Φαμπρίτσιο Ρομάνο. Ωστόσο η θέση του επιθετικού δεν είναι η μόνη στην οποία θα ενισχυθούν οι Πειραιώτες. Παράλληλα με την είδηση για τον Ισπανό στράικερ, γράφτηκε στην Πορτογαλία ότι ο Κάρλος Καρβαλιάλ θέλει τον Αντρέ Όρτα για τη θέση του χαφ αλλά η Μπράγκα δεν δείχνει θετική να τον παραχωρήσει ως δανεικό και κοιτάει μόνο προτάσεις για την πώλησή του. Επίσης, στην Αργεντινή αναφέρθηκαν ξανά για τον Αγκουστίν Παλαβεσίνο της Ρίβερ Πλέιτ , κάνοντας λόγο για πρόταση των Πειραιωτών για την απόκτησή του. Από εκεί και πέρα, ο Ολυμπιακός θα κινηθούν για δύο κεντρικούς αμυντικούς, για έναν χαφ, έναν εξτρέμ και ίσως έναν ξένο τερματοφύλακα. Την ίδια στιγμή αναμένεται να υπάρξουν και αποχωρήσεις από το ρόστερ καθώς παρελθόν αναμένεται να αποτελέσει ο Νίκολας Φρέιρε και σε εξαιρετικά δύσκολη θέση είναι τόσο ο Βιθέντε Ιμπόρα με τον Κίνι όσο και ο Όλα Σολμπάκεν .

newsArray.title: Mercato - Real Madrid : Coup de théâtre, le retour de Zidane est possible ?
newsArray.description: Alors que le contrat de Carlo Ancelotti arrivait à son terme à la fin de la saison, le Real Madrid a annoncé ce vendredi qu’il avait prolongé de deux ans et demi, jusqu’en juin 2026. Une mauvaise…
newsArray.content: Alors que le contrat de Carlo Ancelotti arrivait à son terme à la fin de la saison, le Real Madrid a annoncé ce vendredi qu’il avait prolongé de deux ans et demi, jusqu’en juin 2026. Une mauvaise nouvelle pour Zinédine Zidane, qui faisait partie des noms évoqués pour succéder au technicien italien. Mais un retour de l'entraîneur français serait malgré tout possible. Après avoir vu Didier Deschamps prolonger son contrat en tant que sélectionneur de l’ équipe de France jusqu’en 2026 l’année dernière, une autre porte s’est refermée pour Zinédine Zidane . Sans club depuis 2021, le Ballon d’Or 1998 faisait partie des entraîneurs évoqués pour prendre la succession de Carlo Ancelotti si ce dernier venait à quitter le Real Madrid , tout comme Xabi Alonso . Mercato - Real Madrid : C’est terminé pour Zidane, les raisons sont connues https://t.co/5JpKswOFZY pic.twitter.com/FYWJNWZams Un potentiel retour qui a pris du plomb dans l’aile ce vendredi. En effet, le Real Madrid a officialisé la prolongation de Carlo Ancelotti . Ce dernier a étendu son contrat de deux ans et demi, jusqu'en juin 2026. Si cela peut paraître comme une mauvaise nouvelle dans l’optique de son retour, Zinédine Zidane pourrait malgré tout redevenir l’entraîneur du Real Madrid dans un futur proche. En effet, car d’après les informations de The Athletic , si Carlo Ancelotti a bien prolongé son contrat, il n’est pas assuré pour autant de rester l’entraîneur du Real Madrid . L’accord entre les deux parties prévoit que le technicien italien pourrait exercer une autre fonction au sein du club, si jamais les Merengue décidaient de changer d’entraîneur. Ce que la Casa Blanca avait déjà fait en 2018. Santiago Solari avait remplacé Julen Lopetegui sur le banc madrilène, avant de laisser sa place à Zinédine Zidane en mars 2019, mais il était malgré tout resté au Real Madrid . Une bonne nouvelle pour un retour du Français dans la capitale espagnole ? Affaire à suivre…

newsArray.title: Real Madrid : Carlo Ancelotti reçoit deux cadeaux avec sa prolongation
newsArray.description: Prolongé jusqu’en juin 2026 sur le banc du Real Madrid, Carlo Ancelotti (64 ans) a obtenu pléthores de garanties suite à sa prolongation.
newsArray.content: S’il attend toujours un défenseur central pour finir d’être satisfait, Carlo Ancelotti a vu pléthore de cadeaux de Noël posés sous son sapin au Real Madrid en plus de son nouveau contrat jusqu’en juin 2026. En effet, comme le rapporte Mario Cortegana (The Athletic), l’Italien a reçu de Florentino Perez une clause lui permettant de continuer dans une autre fonction chez les Merengue dès lors qu’il aura fini d’entraîner l’équipe fanion. La fiche du Real Madrid sur But! Football Club Son fils va continuer avec lui Mais ce n’est pas tout ! Relevo rapporte également que la prolongation de Carlo Ancelotti s’accompagne d’une nouvelle signature pour deux saisons supplémentaires de son fils Davide, ainsi que de son préparateur physique Francesco Mauri, qui continueront dans l’ombre du patriarche pendant encore deux ans avant de tenter leur chance ailleurs avec le fils Ancelotti en numéro 1. De quoi ravir l’ancien coach du PSG ? Rejoignez le fil But ! L'Italien restera sans doute au club après son mandat... et son fils Davide va continuer encore deux ans avec lui. Rédacteur Alexandre Corboz

newsArray.title: GALLERY: James Stephens remember past glories - Kilkenny Live
creator: Liam Kelly O’Rourke
newsArray.description: On Saturday, December 2, James Stephens GAA Club held an evening full of nostalgia in the Larchfield Clubhouse as club members and supporters paid tribute to numerous victorious 'Village' teams over the past number of years. A successful period for the club's gaelic football teams in the 1990s and
newsArray.content: On Saturday, December 2, James Stephens GAA Club held an evening full of nostalgia in the Larchfield Clubhouse as club members and supporters paid tribute to numerous victorious 'Village' teams over the past number of years. A successful period for the club's gaelic football teams in the 1990s and 2000s were amongst the teams honoured, with manager and guest of honour, Jim Mulvin, lifting the lid on life with the team, telling many untold and humerous stories from a golden era in James Stephens gaelic football history. A star-studded line-up of guests and attendees on the night included, former Meath Football Manager, Sean Boylan, former President of the Camogie Association, Catherine Neary and current James Stephens Senior Manager, Brian Cody. The function also paid due recognition to the Junior Hurling champions of 2000 captained by Fran Whelan, the U21 Championship kings of 2000 and 2002 led by captains Paddy O'Brien and Gary Whelan respectively and the Junior Camogie champions of 2002 spearheaded on the field by Maggie Moran. Check out next Wednesday's Kilkenny People for more...

newsArray.title: Kickoff | Barker singles out Stellies subs after Pirates win
newsArray.description: Stellenbosch FC coach Steve Barker had some special praise for second-half substitutes who inspired the comeback win over Orlando Pirates.
newsArray.content: Stellies staged an incredible comeback, after rallying from 2-0 down with 21 minutes to go to beat Pirates at Orlando Stadium courtesy of goals from Iqraam Rayners, Devon Titus and Andre de Jong, within a period of eight minutes. Barker revealed the halftime talk he had with his players, although he admitted that at 2-0 down, he thought the game was beyond them. "At half-time we obviously had a serious chat, I just felt first-half we weren't at the races, we just gave them too much respect, we weren't brave enough to get the ball and play," Barker told SuperSport TV. "And I just said to them, listen here, 'We've got nothing to lose in the second-half, just show more braveness, more courage, get on the ball, play the way we can, we're champions of the cup recently for nothing, we're not on an unbeaten run of ten games for nothing. Go and show who you are and what you're made of'. "And when we went 2-0 down, you know I thought obviously the game may be beyond us but I thought a big change was our substitutes. I thought Antonio Van Wyk came on and changed the game, causing problems, we got a little braver with the ball. "Jayden Adams drafted into midfield, helped us with the build-up, (Nhlanhla) Mgaga added, Andre de Jong added to our play and it must be, I don't know, three goals in how minutes, it's probably one of the most incredible moments in that short period. "To come away from home after all the travelling we've been through, 2-0 down at Orlando Stadium, with a big crowd behind Orlando Pirates, to come and win 3-2 it's just amazing," he went on. "I cannot have enough words to say for this group of players, their commitment, their character, their never-say-die-attitude, the way they keep fighting for each other, the way they keep working hard on the field. "That's the reward you get when you put in the hard yards, so credit to them. It's been a fantastic 2023 for us, we finished the year on a high and we look forward to the Carling challenge next week. "It's an incredible eight minutes of football from Stellenbosch Football Club, it's just something really special to come here, get three points, and do the double over Pirates this season. It's massive to be in the top three, four on the log with a game in hand. We can really be proud of what we've done," he added.

newsArray.title: Mercato - PSG : Mbappé a fait une promesse au Real Madrid
newsArray.description: Le 1er janvier approche et à partir de cette date, Kylian Mbappé pourra s’engager avec le club de son choix, lui qui est sous contrat jusqu’en juin 2024 avec le PSG. Une situation dont a bien…
newsArray.content: Le 1er janvier approche et à partir de cette date, Kylian Mbappé pourra s’engager avec le club de son choix, lui qui est sous contrat jusqu’en juin 2024 avec le PSG. Une situation dont a bien l’intention de profiter le Real Madrid. Les Merengue devraient entrer en contact à partir de la semaine prochaine, comme cela serait convenu depuis l’été dernier. Comme indiqué par The Athletic , le Real Madrid va bientôt passer à l’action pour Kylian Mbappé . Ce dernier est toujours sous contrat jusqu’en juin 2024 avec le PSG et dans ces conditions, les Merengue vont de nouveau essayer de s’attacher ses services. Cependant, ils n’attendront pas sa réponse indéfiniment. Mercato - PSG : Une star vend la mèche pour son transfert ? https://t.co/l4AkC0AX1c pic.twitter.com/Rx7TiFu27T Le Real Madrid veut connaître la décision de Kylian Mbappé avant mi-janvier selon The Athletic . Marca de son côté indique que la Casa Blanca attendra la semaine prochaine avant d’entrer en contact avec l’international français. Le but étant de savoir s’il veut rester au PSG ou s’il est prêt à enfin rejoindre le Real Madrid . D’après le quotidien espagnol, Kylian Mbappé aurait assuré au Real Madrid il y a plusieurs mois qu’il comptait le rejoindre. Les deux parties auraient convenu à ce moment-là de se recontacter au début du mois de janvier, période où l’international français sera libre de signer dans un autre club que le PSG .

newsArray.title: BREAKING Ipswich Town vs QPR game suspended over medical emergency in the crowd
creator: staronline@reachplc.com (Kasra Moradi)
newsArray.description: QPR's visit to Ipswich Town in the Championship was temporarily halted after a fan
newsArray.content: Ipswich Town and QPR's Championship clash was postponed due to a medical emergency in the crowd. Friday night's fixture had to be halted due to a medical emergency in the Sir Alf Ramsey Stand. That resulted in a delay to the second half. Paramedics rushed to the scene and a blue blanket was placed to cover the area. Portman Road's PA system then announced that the start of the second half would be delayed. A stretcher was brought to the front of the stand to help treat the fan. There was widespread applause as the supporter was stretchered down the tunnel The official Ipswich Twitter account wrote: "The paramedics have assisted the supporter in the Sir Alf Ramsey Stand and our thoughts are with everyone involved."

newsArray.content: Avec plusieurs de ses cadres évoluant désormais en Arabie Saoudite, Aliou Cissé qui s’exprimait en conférence de presse ce jeudi a déclaré que cela n’était pas un handicap pour son équipe. Le sélectionneur des Lions a par ailleurs affirmé qu’il fallait toutefois montrer que le Sénégal pouvait gagner avec des cadres évoluant partout dans le monde y compris dans des championnats supposés « moins compétitifs ». newsArray.title: ESPN to Deploy Onboard Float Camera, Multiple Drones, and Unreal Engine-Powered Graphics for 2024 Rose Parade Coverage
creator: SVG Staff
newsArray.description: ABC, the longtime broadcast home of the Rose Parade, will collaborate with ESPN to televise the 135th edition of the New Year’s Day parade in Pasadena, CA to millions around the country. To celebrate the excitement surrounding the postseason and the Road to Houston, ESPN has entered a float in this year’s parade for the first time in nearly two decades. Planning began with ESPN’s Synergy team in early November, and the result has been an intensive cross-departmental effort to bring the floral-decorated, football-themed float to life. For the first time in history, an onboard camera will show a float traveling from the barns in Irwindale to the start of the parade route in Pasadena on the evening of Dec. 31. Drones will be used throughout the production of this year’s parade, giving viewers an aerial look at the pageantry and passion surrounding this annual celebration. In addition, ESPN’s highly stylized graphics package produced using Epic Games' Unreal Engine, which debuted in last year’s show, will return for the broadcast. Unreal Engine took a major leap forward during last year's Rose Parade production when ESPN became the first to deploy UE as an end-to-end live-broadcast-graphics tool. ESPN used the Project Avalanche” tool in Unreal Engine 5 to produce the entire graphics package from design to on-air playout. “A collaboration between Marketing, Media Planning, and Synergy, we entered CFP planning in search of a one-of-a-kind, high impact tactic that would have extensive reach and would delight fans in a way we never have before,” says Erin Thornton, Senior Director of Synergy Strategy and Solutions. “We gravitated toward partnering with the Tournament of Roses on a float that showcases two icons of the postseason – the Rose Bowl and the College Football Playoff National Championship trophy. We couldn't think of a more unique way to drive tune-in to the National Championship Game, celebrate the final four-team Playoff, and dazzle parade viewers with a beautiful float and some of their favorite ESPN personalities.” ESPN’s float celebrates the four CFP Semifinalists – Michigan, Washington, Texas and Alabama – whose stories meet at The Rose Bowl Game Presented by Prudential and The Allstate Sugar Bowl, as well as those who make the sport truly special, the fans. The float itself tops out at 16 feet tall – thanks to a towering CFP trophy – and is 28 feet long and 17 feet wide. Nearly 6,000 flowers were used to create ESPN’s float and the construction utilizes sod directly from the Rose Bowl Stadium, as well as a mix of materials ranging from green ground parsley flakes, white fine ground rice, stems of brown coffee, gold flax seed, whole split pea, and more. Riding this year’s ESPN float will be Laura Rutledge, Tim Tebow, Paul Finebaum, Jordan Rodgers and Roman Harper of SEC Network’s SEC Nation, Jess Sims from ESPN’s College GameDay Built by the Home Depot, Marty Smith and Ryan McGee of SEC Network’s Marty & McGee, Andrew Spencer from ABC’s The Bachelorette, plus celebrity superfans representing both participating teams in Pasadena – country music chart-topper Walker Hayes (Alabama) and Golden Globe & Emmy Award-winner Darren Criss (Michigan). In addition, executive director of the College Football Playoff Bill Hancock and his wife Nicki will join the ESPN personalities on the float. Both Sims and Marty & McGee will report from the float as it heads down the parade route toward Orange & Colorado. For the ABC broadcast, SportsCenter anchors Hannah Storm and Kevin Negandhi return to co-host the 135th Rose Parade on ABC. The annual “Where Flowers Meet Football” handoff during the parade broadcast will be performed by recent College Football Hall of Fame inductee Tebow, who will pass the football to ESPN teammates Rece Davis and Desmond Howard of College GameDay Built by The Home Depot, representing the progression in the day’s events from the Rose Parade to the Rose Bowl Game Presented by Prudential. ESPN’s production of the 135th Rose Parade on ABC kicks off a full day of football action across ESPN platforms, including the MegaCast presentations of the College Football Playoff Semifinals at the Rose Bowl Game Presented by Prudential (5 p.m.) and the Allstate Sugar Bowl (8:45 p.m.). College GameDay Built by The Home Depot will host its annual Rose Bowl Game edition on New Year’s Day, as part of ESPN’s overall studio coverage. Lead ESPN college football analyst Kirk Herbstreit will be inducted into the Rose Bowl Hall of Fame on New Year’s Day, while also calling his 16th Rose Bowl Game. The newly minted Hall of Famer will be joined on the game call by longtime play-by-play partner Chris Fowler, Emmy Award winner Holly Rowe and NFL Live and SEC Nation host Laura Rutledge, who kicks off her day on ESPN’s Rose Bowl Parade float.

newsArray.title: Kenny Pickett won't start but questionable to back up Mason Rudolph
newsArray.description: The Steelers announced Friday that Mason Rudolph will get a second consecutive start at quarterback.
newsArray.content: The Steelers announced Friday that Mason Rudolph will get a second consecutive start at quarterback. The team lists Kenny Pickett (ankle) as questionable, so he could return as the backup this week. Pickett said earlier this week that he is ready to return after surgery earlier this month, but it’s not his decision on when he returns. “It feels like with what I need to do,” Pickett said, via Ray Fittipaldo of the . “It’s really not how I feel. It’s what they see me doing and how they feel like I’m moving around and everything.” The Steelers made Pickett inactive last week. Although Rudolph took the first-team reps this week, Pickett got some work, too. The team ruled out defensive back Trenton Thompson (neck), free safety Minkah Fitzpatrick (knee) and outside linebacker Elandon Roberts (pectoral).

newsArray.title: Ολυμπιακός: Ο Ναβάρο και οι επόμενες κινήσεις
newsArray.description: Ο Φραν Ναβάρο είναι έτοιμος να φορέσει τη φανέλα του Ολυμπιακού, την ίδια στιγμή που στις τάξεις των «ερυθρολεύκων» τρέχουν και άλλες περιπτώσεις για να ενισχυθεί το ρόστερ.
newsArray.content: Λίγο πριν ανοίξει το μεταγραφικό παζάρι του Γενάρη, ο Ολυμπιακός είναι έτοιμος να ολοκληρώσει την πρώτη του χειμερινή μεταγραφή που ακούει στο όνομα του Φραν Ναβάρο. Ο 25χρονος φορ θα έρθει ως δανεικός από την Πόρτο και θα έχει οψιόν αγοράς ύψους 7,5 εκατ. ευρώ για το ερχόμενο καλοκαίρι όπως έγραψε ο Φαμπρίτσιο Ρομάνο. Ωστόσο η θέση του επιθετικού δεν είναι η μόνη στην οποία θα ενισχυθούν οι Πειραιώτες. Παράλληλα με την είδηση για τον Ισπανό στράικερ, γράφτηκε στην Πορτογαλία ότι ο Κάρλος Καρβαλιάλ θέλει τον Αντρέ Όρτα για τη θέση του χαφ αλλά η Μπράγκα δεν δείχνει θετική να τον παραχωρήσει ως δανεικό και κοιτάει μόνο προτάσεις για την πώλησή του. Επίσης, στην Αργεντινή αναφέρθηκαν ξανά για τον Αγκουστίν Παλαβεσίνο της Ρίβερ Πλέιτ , κάνοντας λόγο για πρόταση των Πειραιωτών για την απόκτησή του. Από εκεί και πέρα, ο Ολυμπιακός θα κινηθούν για δύο κεντρικούς αμυντικούς, για έναν χαφ, έναν εξτρέμ και ίσως έναν ξένο τερματοφύλακα. Την ίδια στιγμή αναμένεται να υπάρξουν και αποχωρήσεις από το ρόστερ καθώς παρελθόν αναμένεται να αποτελέσει ο Νίκολας Φρέιρε και σε εξαιρετικά δύσκολη θέση είναι τόσο ο Βιθέντε Ιμπόρα με τον Κίνι όσο και ο Όλα Σολμπάκεν .

newsArray.title: Mercato - Real Madrid : Coup de théâtre, le retour de Zidane est possible ?
newsArray.description: Alors que le contrat de Carlo Ancelotti arrivait à son terme à la fin de la saison, le Real Madrid a annoncé ce vendredi qu’il avait prolongé de deux ans et demi, jusqu’en juin 2026. Une mauvaise…
newsArray.content: Alors que le contrat de Carlo Ancelotti arrivait à son terme à la fin de la saison, le Real Madrid a annoncé ce vendredi qu’il avait prolongé de deux ans et demi, jusqu’en juin 2026. Une mauvaise nouvelle pour Zinédine Zidane, qui faisait partie des noms évoqués pour succéder au technicien italien. Mais un retour de l'entraîneur français serait malgré tout possible. Après avoir vu Didier Deschamps prolonger son contrat en tant que sélectionneur de l’ équipe de France jusqu’en 2026 l’année dernière, une autre porte s’est refermée pour Zinédine Zidane . Sans club depuis 2021, le Ballon d’Or 1998 faisait partie des entraîneurs évoqués pour prendre la succession de Carlo Ancelotti si ce dernier venait à quitter le Real Madrid , tout comme Xabi Alonso . Mercato - Real Madrid : C’est terminé pour Zidane, les raisons sont connues https://t.co/5JpKswOFZY pic.twitter.com/FYWJNWZams Un potentiel retour qui a pris du plomb dans l’aile ce vendredi. En effet, le Real Madrid a officialisé la prolongation de Carlo Ancelotti . Ce dernier a étendu son contrat de deux ans et demi, jusqu'en juin 2026. Si cela peut paraître comme une mauvaise nouvelle dans l’optique de son retour, Zinédine Zidane pourrait malgré tout redevenir l’entraîneur du Real Madrid dans un futur proche. En effet, car d’après les informations de The Athletic , si Carlo Ancelotti a bien prolongé son contrat, il n’est pas assuré pour autant de rester l’entraîneur du Real Madrid . L’accord entre les deux parties prévoit que le technicien italien pourrait exercer une autre fonction au sein du club, si jamais les Merengue décidaient de changer d’entraîneur. Ce que la Casa Blanca avait déjà fait en 2018. Santiago Solari avait remplacé Julen Lopetegui sur le banc madrilène, avant de laisser sa place à Zinédine Zidane en mars 2019, mais il était malgré tout resté au Real Madrid . Une bonne nouvelle pour un retour du Français dans la capitale espagnole ? Affaire à suivre…

newsArray.title: Real Madrid : Carlo Ancelotti reçoit deux cadeaux avec sa prolongation
newsArray.description: Prolongé jusqu’en juin 2026 sur le banc du Real Madrid, Carlo Ancelotti (64 ans) a obtenu pléthores de garanties suite à sa prolongation.
newsArray.content: S’il attend toujours un défenseur central pour finir d’être satisfait, Carlo Ancelotti a vu pléthore de cadeaux de Noël posés sous son sapin au Real Madrid en plus de son nouveau contrat jusqu’en juin 2026. En effet, comme le rapporte Mario Cortegana (The Athletic), l’Italien a reçu de Florentino Perez une clause lui permettant de continuer dans une autre fonction chez les Merengue dès lors qu’il aura fini d’entraîner l’équipe fanion. La fiche du Real Madrid sur But! Football Club Son fils va continuer avec lui Mais ce n’est pas tout ! Relevo rapporte également que la prolongation de Carlo Ancelotti s’accompagne d’une nouvelle signature pour deux saisons supplémentaires de son fils Davide, ainsi que de son préparateur physique Francesco Mauri, qui continueront dans l’ombre du patriarche pendant encore deux ans avant de tenter leur chance ailleurs avec le fils Ancelotti en numéro 1. De quoi ravir l’ancien coach du PSG ? Rejoignez le fil But ! L'Italien restera sans doute au club après son mandat... et son fils Davide va continuer encore deux ans avec lui. Rédacteur Alexandre Corboz

newsArray.title: GALLERY: James Stephens remember past glories - Kilkenny Live
creator: Liam Kelly O’Rourke
newsArray.description: On Saturday, December 2, James Stephens GAA Club held an evening full of nostalgia in the Larchfield Clubhouse as club members and supporters paid tribute to numerous victorious 'Village' teams over the past number of years. A successful period for the club's gaelic football teams in the 1990s and
newsArray.content: On Saturday, December 2, James Stephens GAA Club held an evening full of nostalgia in the Larchfield Clubhouse as club members and supporters paid tribute to numerous victorious 'Village' teams over the past number of years. A successful period for the club's gaelic football teams in the 1990s and 2000s were amongst the teams honoured, with manager and guest of honour, Jim Mulvin, lifting the lid on life with the team, telling many untold and humerous stories from a golden era in James Stephens gaelic football history. A star-studded line-up of guests and attendees on the night included, former Meath Football Manager, Sean Boylan, former President of the Camogie Association, Catherine Neary and current James Stephens Senior Manager, Brian Cody. The function also paid due recognition to the Junior Hurling champions of 2000 captained by Fran Whelan, the U21 Championship kings of 2000 and 2002 led by captains Paddy O'Brien and Gary Whelan respectively and the Junior Camogie champions of 2002 spearheaded on the field by Maggie Moran. Check out next Wednesday's Kilkenny People for more...

newsArray.title: Kickoff | Barker singles out Stellies subs after Pirates win
newsArray.description: Stellenbosch FC coach Steve Barker had some special praise for second-half substitutes who inspired the comeback win over Orlando Pirates.
newsArray.content: Stellies staged an incredible comeback, after rallying from 2-0 down with 21 minutes to go to beat Pirates at Orlando Stadium courtesy of goals from Iqraam Rayners, Devon Titus and Andre de Jong, within a period of eight minutes. Barker revealed the halftime talk he had with his players, although he admitted that at 2-0 down, he thought the game was beyond them. "At half-time we obviously had a serious chat, I just felt first-half we weren't at the races, we just gave them too much respect, we weren't brave enough to get the ball and play," Barker told SuperSport TV. "And I just said to them, listen here, 'We've got nothing to lose in the second-half, just show more braveness, more courage, get on the ball, play the way we can, we're champions of the cup recently for nothing, we're not on an unbeaten run of ten games for nothing. Go and show who you are and what you're made of'. "And when we went 2-0 down, you know I thought obviously the game may be beyond us but I thought a big change was our substitutes. I thought Antonio Van Wyk came on and changed the game, causing problems, we got a little braver with the ball. "Jayden Adams drafted into midfield, helped us with the build-up, (Nhlanhla) Mgaga added, Andre de Jong added to our play and it must be, I don't know, three goals in how minutes, it's probably one of the most incredible moments in that short period. "To come away from home after all the travelling we've been through, 2-0 down at Orlando Stadium, with a big crowd behind Orlando Pirates, to come and win 3-2 it's just amazing," he went on. "I cannot have enough words to say for this group of players, their commitment, their character, their never-say-die-attitude, the way they keep fighting for each other, the way they keep working hard on the field. "That's the reward you get when you put in the hard yards, so credit to them. It's been a fantastic 2023 for us, we finished the year on a high and we look forward to the Carling challenge next week. "It's an incredible eight minutes of football from Stellenbosch Football Club, it's just something really special to come here, get three points, and do the double over Pirates this season. It's massive to be in the top three, four on the log with a game in hand. We can really be proud of what we've done," he added.

newsArray.title: BREAKING Ipswich Town vs QPR game suspended over medical emergency in the crowd
creator: staronline@reachplc.com (Kasra Moradi)
newsArray.description: QPR's visit to Ipswich Town in the Championship was temporarily halted after a fan
newsArray.content: Ipswich Town and QPR's Championship clash was postponed due to a medical emergency in the crowd. Friday night's fixture had to be halted due to a medical emergency in the Sir Alf Ramsey Stand. That resulted in a delay to the second half. Paramedics rushed to the scene and a blue blanket was placed to cover the area. Portman Road's PA system then announced that the start of the second half would be delayed. A stretcher was brought to the front of the stand to help treat the fan. There was widespread applause as the supporter was stretchered down the tunnel The official Ipswich Twitter account wrote: "The paramedics have assisted the supporter in the Sir Alf Ramsey Stand and our thoughts are with everyone involved."

newsArray.title: Aliou Cissé sur ses cadres évoluant en SPL en vue de la CAN : « En 2022 ils étaient dans les plus grands clubs européens, maintenant ça a changé… »
creator: Pape Moussa Ndour
newsArray.description: (wiwsport) - Avec plusieurs de ses cadres évoluant désormais en Arabie Saoudite, Aliou Cissé qui s’exprimait en conférence de presse ce jeudi a déclaré que cela n’était pas un handicap pour son équipe. Le sélectionneur des Lions a par ailleurs affirmé qu’il fallait toutefois montrer que le Sénégal pouvait gagner avec des cadres évoluant partout dans le […] Cet article a été initialement publié sur wiwsport : site n°1 de l'actualité sportive du Sénégal (wiwsport.com). Article source : Aliou Cissé sur ses cadres évoluant en SPL en vue de la CAN : « En 2022 ils étaient dans les plus grands clubs européens, maintenant ça a changé… »
newsArray.content: Avec plusieurs de ses cadres évoluant désormais en Arabie Saoudite, Aliou Cissé qui s’exprimait en conférence de presse ce jeudi a déclaré que cela n’était pas un handicap pour son équipe. Le sélectionneur des Lions a par ailleurs affirmé qu’il fallait toutefois montrer que le Sénégal pouvait gagner avec des cadres évoluant partout dans le monde y compris dans des championnats supposés « moins compétitifs ». Wiwsport.com

newsArray.title: ESPN to Deploy Onboard Float Camera, Multiple Drones, and Unreal Engine-Powered Graphics for 2024 Rose Parade Coverage
creator: SVG Staff
newsArray.description: ABC, the longtime broadcast home of the Rose Parade, will collaborate with ESPN to televise the 135th edition of the New Year’s Day parade in Pasadena, CA to millions around the country. To celebrate the excitement surrounding the postseason and the Road to Houston, ESPN has entered a float in this year’s parade for the first time in nearly two decades. Planning began with ESPN’s Synergy team in early November, and the result has been an intensive cross-departmental effort to bring the floral-decorated, football-themed float to life. For the first time in history, an onboard camera will show a float traveling from the barns in Irwindale to the start of the parade route in Pasadena on the evening of Dec. 31. Drones will be used throughout the production of this year’s parade, giving viewers an aerial look at the pageantry and passion surrounding this annual celebration. In addition, ESPN’s highly stylized graphics package produced using Epic Games' Unreal Engine, which debuted in last year’s show, will return for the broadcast. Unreal Engine took a major leap forward during last year's Rose Parade production when ESPN became the first to deploy UE as an end-to-end live-broadcast-graphics tool. ESPN used the Project Avalanche” tool in Unreal Engine 5 to produce the entire graphics package from design to on-air playout. “A collaboration between Marketing, Media Planning, and Synergy, we entered CFP planning in search of a one-of-a-kind, high impact tactic that would have extensive reach and would delight fans in a way we never have before,” says Erin Thornton, Senior Director of Synergy Strategy and Solutions. “We gravitated toward partnering with the Tournament of Roses on a float that showcases two icons of the postseason – the Rose Bowl and the College Football Playoff National Championship trophy. We couldn't think of a more unique way to drive tune-in to the National Championship Game, celebrate the final four-team Playoff, and dazzle parade viewers with a beautiful float and some of their favorite ESPN personalities.” ESPN’s float celebrates the four CFP Semifinalists – Michigan, Washington, Texas and Alabama – whose stories meet at The Rose Bowl Game Presented by Prudential and The Allstate Sugar Bowl, as well as those who make the sport truly special, the fans. The float itself tops out at 16 feet tall – thanks to a towering CFP trophy – and is 28 feet long and 17 feet wide. Nearly 6,000 flowers were used to create ESPN’s float and the construction utilizes sod directly from the Rose Bowl Stadium, as well as a mix of materials ranging from green ground parsley flakes, white fine ground rice, stems of brown coffee, gold flax seed, whole split pea, and more. Riding this year’s ESPN float will be Laura Rutledge, Tim Tebow, Paul Finebaum, Jordan Rodgers and Roman Harper of SEC Network’s SEC Nation, Jess Sims from ESPN’s College GameDay Built by the Home Depot, Marty Smith and Ryan McGee of SEC Network’s Marty & McGee, Andrew Spencer from ABC’s The Bachelorette, plus celebrity superfans representing both participating teams in Pasadena – country music chart-topper Walker Hayes (Alabama) and Golden Globe & Emmy Award-winner Darren Criss (Michigan). In addition, executive director of the College Football Playoff Bill Hancock and his wife Nicki will join the ESPN personalities on the float. Both Sims and Marty & McGee will report from the float as it heads down the parade route toward Orange & Colorado. For the ABC broadcast, SportsCenter anchors Hannah Storm and Kevin Negandhi return to co-host the 135th Rose Parade on ABC. The annual “Where Flowers Meet Football” handoff during the parade broadcast will be performed by recent College Football Hall of Fame inductee Tebow, who will pass the football to ESPN teammates Rece Davis and Desmond Howard of College GameDay Built by The Home Depot, representing the progression in the day’s events from the Rose Parade to the Rose Bowl Game Presented by Prudential. ESPN’s production of the 135th Rose Parade on ABC kicks off a full day of football action across ESPN platforms, including the MegaCast presentations of the College Football Playoff Semifinals at the Rose Bowl Game Presented by Prudential (5 p.m.) and the Allstate Sugar Bowl (8:45 p.m.). College GameDay Built by The Home Depot will host its annual Rose Bowl Game edition on New Year’s Day, as part of ESPN’s overall studio coverage. Lead ESPN college football analyst Kirk Herbstreit will be inducted into the Rose Bowl Hall of Fame on New Year’s Day, while also calling his 16th Rose Bowl Game. The newly minted Hall of Famer will be joined on the game call by longtime play-by-play partner Chris Fowler, Emmy Award winner Holly Rowe and NFL Live and SEC Nation host Laura Rutledge, who kicks off her day on ESPN’s Rose Bowl Parade float.

newsArray.title: Kenny Pickett won't start but questionable to back up Mason Rudolph
newsArray.description: The Steelers announced Friday that Mason Rudolph will get a second consecutive start at quarterback.
newsArray.content: The Steelers announced Friday that Mason Rudolph will get a second consecutive start at quarterback. The team lists Kenny Pickett (ankle) as questionable, so he could return as the backup this week. Pickett said earlier this week that he is ready to return after surgery earlier this month, but it’s not his decision on when he returns. “It feels like with what I need to do,” Pickett said, via Ray Fittipaldo of the . “It’s really not how I feel. It’s what they see me doing and how they feel like I’m moving around and everything.” The Steelers made Pickett inactive last week. Although Rudolph took the first-team reps this week, Pickett got some work, too. The team ruled out defensive back Trenton Thompson (neck), free safety Minkah Fitzpatrick (knee) and outside linebacker Elandon Roberts (pectoral).

newsArray.title: Ολυμπιακός: Ο Ναβάρο και οι επόμενες κινήσεις
newsArray.description: Ο Φραν Ναβάρο είναι έτοιμος να φορέσει τη φανέλα του Ολυμπιακού, την ίδια στιγμή που στις τάξεις των «ερυθρολεύκων» τρέχουν και άλλες περιπτώσεις για να ενισχυθεί το ρόστερ.
newsArray.content: Λίγο πριν ανοίξει το μεταγραφικό παζάρι του Γενάρη, ο Ολυμπιακός είναι έτοιμος να ολοκληρώσει την πρώτη του χειμερινή μεταγραφή που ακούει στο όνομα του Φραν Ναβάρο. Ο 25χρονος φορ θα έρθει ως δανεικός από την Πόρτο και θα έχει οψιόν αγοράς ύψους 7,5 εκατ. ευρώ για το ερχόμενο καλοκαίρι όπως έγραψε ο Φαμπρίτσιο Ρομάνο. Ωστόσο η θέση του επιθετικού δεν είναι η μόνη στην οποία θα ενισχυθούν οι Πειραιώτες. Παράλληλα με την είδηση για τον Ισπανό στράικερ, γράφτηκε στην Πορτογαλία ότι ο Κάρλος Καρβαλιάλ θέλει τον Αντρέ Όρτα για τη θέση του χαφ αλλά η Μπράγκα δεν δείχνει θετική να τον παραχωρήσει ως δανεικό και κοιτάει μόνο προτάσεις για την πώλησή του. Επίσης, στην Αργεντινή αναφέρθηκαν ξανά για τον Αγκουστίν Παλαβεσίνο της Ρίβερ Πλέιτ , κάνοντας λόγο για πρόταση των Πειραιωτών για την απόκτησή του. Από εκεί και πέρα, ο Ολυμπιακός θα κινηθούν για δύο κεντρικούς αμυντικούς, για έναν χαφ, έναν εξτρέμ και ίσως έναν ξένο τερματοφύλακα. Την ίδια στιγμή αναμένεται να υπάρξουν και αποχωρήσεις από το ρόστερ καθώς παρελθόν αναμένεται να αποτελέσει ο Νίκολας Φρέιρε και σε εξαιρετικά δύσκολη θέση είναι τόσο ο Βιθέντε Ιμπόρα με τον Κίνι όσο και ο Όλα Σολμπάκεν .

newsArray.title: Mercato - Real Madrid : Coup de théâtre, le retour de Zidane est possible ?
newsArray.description: Alors que le contrat de Carlo Ancelotti arrivait à son terme à la fin de la saison, le Real Madrid a annoncé ce vendredi qu’il avait prolongé de deux ans et demi, jusqu’en juin 2026. Une mauvaise…
newsArray.content: Alors que le contrat de Carlo Ancelotti arrivait à son terme à la fin de la saison, le Real Madrid a annoncé ce vendredi qu’il avait prolongé de deux ans et demi, jusqu’en juin 2026. Une mauvaise nouvelle pour Zinédine Zidane, qui faisait partie des noms évoqués pour succéder au technicien italien. Mais un retour de l'entraîneur français serait malgré tout possible. Après avoir vu Didier Deschamps prolonger son contrat en tant que sélectionneur de l’ équipe de France jusqu’en 2026 l’année dernière, une autre porte s’est refermée pour Zinédine Zidane . Sans club depuis 2021, le Ballon d’Or 1998 faisait partie des entraîneurs évoqués pour prendre la succession de Carlo Ancelotti si ce dernier venait à quitter le Real Madrid , tout comme Xabi Alonso . Mercato - Real Madrid : C’est terminé pour Zidane, les raisons sont connues https://t.co/5JpKswOFZY pic.twitter.com/FYWJNWZams Un potentiel retour qui a pris du plomb dans l’aile ce vendredi. En effet, le Real Madrid a officialisé la prolongation de Carlo Ancelotti . Ce dernier a étendu son contrat de deux ans et demi, jusqu'en juin 2026. Si cela peut paraître comme une mauvaise nouvelle dans l’optique de son retour, Zinédine Zidane pourrait malgré tout redevenir l’entraîneur du Real Madrid dans un futur proche. En effet, car d’après les informations de The Athletic , si Carlo Ancelotti a bien prolongé son contrat, il n’est pas assuré pour autant de rester l’entraîneur du Real Madrid . L’accord entre les deux parties prévoit que le technicien italien pourrait exercer une autre fonction au sein du club, si jamais les Merengue décidaient de changer d’entraîneur. Ce que la Casa Blanca avait déjà fait en 2018. Santiago Solari avait remplacé Julen Lopetegui sur le banc madrilène, avant de laisser sa place à Zinédine Zidane en mars 2019, mais il était malgré tout resté au Real Madrid . Une bonne nouvelle pour un retour du Français dans la capitale espagnole ? Affaire à suivre…

newsArray.title: Real Madrid : Carlo Ancelotti reçoit deux cadeaux avec sa prolongation
newsArray.description: Prolongé jusqu’en juin 2026 sur le banc du Real Madrid, Carlo Ancelotti (64 ans) a obtenu pléthores de garanties suite à sa prolongation.
newsArray.content: S’il attend toujours un défenseur central pour finir d’être satisfait, Carlo Ancelotti a vu pléthore de cadeaux de Noël posés sous son sapin au Real Madrid en plus de son nouveau contrat jusqu’en juin 2026. En effet, comme le rapporte Mario Cortegana (The Athletic), l’Italien a reçu de Florentino Perez une clause lui permettant de continuer dans une autre fonction chez les Merengue dès lors qu’il aura fini d’entraîner l’équipe fanion. La fiche du Real Madrid sur But! Football Club Son fils va continuer avec lui Mais ce n’est pas tout ! Relevo rapporte également que la prolongation de Carlo Ancelotti s’accompagne d’une nouvelle signature pour deux saisons supplémentaires de son fils Davide, ainsi que de son préparateur physique Francesco Mauri, qui continueront dans l’ombre du patriarche pendant encore deux ans avant de tenter leur chance ailleurs avec le fils Ancelotti en numéro 1. De quoi ravir l’ancien coach du PSG ? Rejoignez le fil But ! Football Club sur WhatsApp pour ne rien rater des grosses infos sur vos clubs favoris. function getDimensionGA() { var dimension1 = "142"; return dimension1; } Voir le fil infos Podcast Men's Up Life function runBeOp(){ window.beOpAsyncInit = function() { BeOpSDK.init({ account: "58d5018fa78ec734e9050ab9", }); BeOpSDK.watch(); } } Pour résumer Prolongé jusqu’en juin 2026 sur le banc du Real Madrid, Carlo Ancelotti (64 ans) a obtenu pléthores de garanties suite à sa prolongation. L'Italien restera sans doute au club après son mandat... et son fils Davide va continuer encore deux ans avec lui. Rédacteur Alexandre Corboz

newsArray.title: GALLERY: James Stephens remember past glories - Kilkenny Live
creator: Liam Kelly O’Rourke
newsArray.description: On Saturday, December 2, James Stephens GAA Club held an evening full of nostalgia in the Larchfield Clubhouse as club members and supporters paid tribute to numerous victorious 'Village' teams over the past number of years. A successful period for the club's gaelic football teams in the 1990s and
newsArray.content: On Saturday, December 2, James Stephens GAA Club held an evening full of nostalgia in the Larchfield Clubhouse as club members and supporters paid tribute to numerous victorious 'Village' teams over the past number of years. A successful period for the club's gaelic football teams in the 1990s and 2000s were amongst the teams honoured, with manager and guest of honour, Jim Mulvin, lifting the lid on life with the team, telling many untold and humerous stories from a golden era in James Stephens gaelic football history. A star-studded line-up of guests and attendees on the night included, former Meath Football Manager, Sean Boylan, former President of the Camogie Association, Catherine Neary and current James Stephens Senior Manager, Brian Cody. The function also paid due recognition to the Junior Hurling champions of 2000 captained by Fran Whelan, the U21 Championship kings of 2000 and 2002 led by captains Paddy O'Brien and Gary Whelan respectively and the Junior Camogie champions of 2002 spearheaded on the field by Maggie Moran. Check out next Wednesday's Kilkenny People for more...
